src:
Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019 : Rizki/Della Kalah, Rinov/Pitha Melaju Ke Babak Kedua
05 Nov 2019, 16:59 by Danang Sundoro



Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019 : Rizki/Della Kalah, Rinov/Pitha Melaju Ke Babak Kedua



Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019 : Rizki/Della Kalah, Rinov/Pitha Melaju Ke Babak Kedua


KBRN, Fuzhou : Ganda Putri Indonesia, Rizki Amelia Pradipta/Della Destiara Haris masih belum dapat menundukkan  unggulan keempat Jepang, pasangan Misaki Matsutomo/Ayaka Takahashi dalam pertandingan babak pertama Turnamen Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019 dengan skor 9-21, 6-21 di Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Selasa (5/11/2019).Permainan Rizki/Della memang tak dapat berkembang pada laga kali ini. Usaha dalam memperoleh point dari lawan, kandas karena kesalahan sendiri. Di game kedua, Rizki/Della masih belum bisa keluar dari tekanan irama permainan Matsutomo/Takahashi. “Bola-bola pengembalian kami bisa ditebak oleh lawan, kami jadi bingung sendiri. Mereka juga bermain lebih yakin dengan kondisi bola yang cukup berat,” kata Rizki usai laga dalam keterangan tertulis dari PP.PBSI kepada Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Selasa (5/11/2019).“Bisa dibilang pasangan Jepang ini punya kemampuan yang komplit. Mereka punya serangan yang bagus dan pertahanan yang rapat. Lawan juga bisa bisa lihat kesempatan kapan posisi kami nggak enak dan mereka menyerang,” jelas Della. “Kami sudah mencoba berbagai cara, main menyerang nggak tembus, kami coba defense dan coba balik serang tapi jadi bumerang sendiri buat kami,” ungkap Della. Dengan hasil ini, maka nomor ganda putri Indonesia tinggal bertumpu pada pasangan Greysia Polii/Apriyani Rahayu yang baru akan bertanding besok, Rabu (6/11/2019) melawan Chow Mei Kuan/Lee Meng Yean dari Malaysia. BACA JUGA : Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019: Ginting Angkat Koper di Awal
Sedangkan, dari nomor ganda campuran, Rinov Rivaldy/Pitha Haningtyas Mentari berhasil merebut tiket ke babak kedua, usai menaklukkan wakil Jepang, Yuki Kaneko/Misaki Matsutomo dengan skor 21-13, 16-21, 21-15.
Di babak kedua, pasangan ganda campuran juara dunia junior 2017 Rinov/Pitha akan menghadapi pemenang dari laga antara Marcus Ellis/Lauren Smith dan Goh Soon Huat/Lai Shevon Jemie.
Sayangnya sektor ganda putra Wahyu Nayaka Arya Pankaryanira/Ade Yusuf Santoso juga takluk di tangan wakil Jepang, Hiroyuki Endo/Yuta Watanabe, dalam dua game langsung 22-24, 13-21.
text:
Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Rizki / Della Lose, Rinov / Pitha Advance to the Second Round
05 Nov 2019, 16:59 by Danang Sundoro



Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Rizki / Della Lose, Rinov / Pitha Advance to the Second Round



Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Rizki / Della Lose, Rinov / Pitha Advance to the Second Round


KBRN, Fuzhou: Indonesian Women's Doubles, Rizki Amelia Pradipta / Della Destiara Haris still can't beat Japan's fourth seed, pair Misaki Matsutomo / Ayaka Takahashi in the first round match of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 Badminton Tournament with a score of 9-21, 6-21 at Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Tuesday (11/5/2019). Rizki / Della's game could not develop in this match. Efforts in gaining points from opponents, foundered by their own mistakes. In the second game, Rizki / Della still cannot get out of the rhythm of the Matsutomo / Takahashi rhythm. "Our return balls are predictable by our opponents, we are confused ourselves. They also play more confident with the condition of the ball that is quite heavy, "Rizki said after the match in a written statement from PP.PBSI to Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Tuesday (11/05/2019)." You could say this Japanese couple have the ability Complete. They have good attack and tight defense. Opponents can also see opportunities when our position is not comfortable and they attack, "explained Della. "We have tried various methods, playing attack does not penetrate, we try defense and try to attack, but backfire on our own," said Della. With this result, the Indonesian women's doubles number only relies on the new Greysia Polii / Apriyani Rahayu pair who will compete tomorrow, Wednesday (11/06/2019) against Chow Mei Kuan / Lee Meng Yean from Malaysia. READ ALSO: Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Ginting Lifts a Suitcase at the Beginning
Meanwhile, from mixed doubles number, Rinov Rivaldy / Pitha Haningtyas Mentari won the ticket to the second round, after defeating the Japanese representative, Yuki Kaneko / Misaki Matsutomo with a score of 21-13, 16-21, 21-15.
In the second half, the mixed pair of junior world champions 2017 Rinov / Pitha will face the winner of the match between Marcus Ellis / Lauren Smith and Goh Soon Huat / Lai Shevon Jemie.
Unfortunately, the men's doubles sector Wahyu Nayaka Arya Pankaryanira / Ade Yusuf Santoso also surrendered at the hands of the Japanese representative, Hiroyuki Endo / Yuta Watanabe, in two straight games 22-24, 13-21.
